name: topographical
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to topography (= the study of the physical appearance of the natural features of land): Frequently a place name was chosen on the basis of a topographical feature. Because of the trees, a lot of topographical maps can be very inaccurate. He studied topographic maps of the area, looking for the best place to build the road. See
topography
More examplesFewer examplesDo a topographical site survey in order to confirm the real area of the property.He criticized the lack of detailed topographical studies of towns at that time.Topographical engineers prepared a map of the ground on which battles were fought.Hills, forests, and other topographic features can affect mobile phone reception.
